org.eclipse.keyple.core.plugin.reader

Interface ObservableReaderStateService.CardInsertionStep

  • Enclosing class:
    ObservableReaderStateService

    public static interface ObservableReaderStateService.CardInsertionStep
    Provide step to setup the type of CardInsertion State detection
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ObservableReaderStateService.CardProcessingStep waitForCardInsertionWithNativeDetection()
      Set up CardInsertionDetection with Native reader ability
      ObservableReaderStateService.CardProcessingStep waitForCardInsertionWithPollingDetection()
      Set up CardInsertionDetection to use polling of the Reader.isCardPresent() method to detect CARD_INSERTED
      ObservableReaderStateService.CardProcessingStep waitForCardInsertionWithSmartDetection()
      Set up CardInsertionDetection to detect the card insertion thanks to the method SmartInsertionReader.waitForCardPresent().

    • Method Detail

      • waitForCardInsertionWithNativeDetection

        ObservableReaderStateService.CardProcessingStep waitForCardInsertionWithNativeDetection()
        Set up CardInsertionDetection with Native reader ability
        Returns:
        A non null reference
        Since:
        1.0

      • waitForCardInsertionWithSmartDetection

        ObservableReaderStateService.CardProcessingStep waitForCardInsertionWithSmartDetection()
        Set up CardInsertionDetection to detect the card insertion thanks to the method SmartInsertionReader.waitForCardPresent().
        Returns:
        A non null reference
        Throws:
        KeypleReaderIOException - if reader does not implements SmartInsertionReader
        Since:
        1.0

      • waitForCardInsertionWithPollingDetection

        ObservableReaderStateService.CardProcessingStep waitForCardInsertionWithPollingDetection()
        Set up CardInsertionDetection to use polling of the Reader.isCardPresent() method to detect CARD_INSERTED
        Returns:
        A non null reference
        Since:
        1.0
